title: Hot Toys Announces 1/6 Joker from DC Comics Batman: The Killing Joke
text: Hot Toys is getting dark as they debut their newest DC Comics 1/6 Scale figure with Joker. Inspired by Batman: The Killing Joke, this figure is a chilling tribute to one of the most iconic Joker stories ever told. Alan Moore and Brian Bolland's legendary 1988…
author: Tyler Roberts

title: Former youth organizer for AOC busted after urging ‘attack’ on Jewish students at Brooklyn public high school
text: A woman urged her 25,000 Instagram followers to “attack” a Brooklyn high school she called a haven for pro-Israel students, sparking an NYPD probe and outrage from Jewish advocates. The now-deleted post targeted Leon M. Goldstein HS in Manhattan Beach.
author: Susan Edelman, Samantha Olander, Tina Moore

text: And this week's newsletter is out, featuring coverage, research and lots of cool stuff from Black Hat and Def Con, and more, plus stories on the data breaches at Google, Cisco, and Air France, the U.S. courts system getting hacked (again), alarm bells over a new Exchange security flaw, and lots more.
